rusiyanu bhashawa idiripita "wikalpa" (wikalpa) matha klik karanna, eelanga kawuluwa windos 10 hi rusiyanu bhashawan athurumuhunatha sandaha pariksha karanu atha (pariganakaya antharjalayata sambandha wiya yuthuya) rusiyanu bhasha athuru muhunatha laba gatha haki nam, "bhasha asuruma bagatha kara sthapanaya karanna" yana sabandiya darshanaya wanu atha (bhasha asuruma bhagatha karanna saha sthapanaya karanna).
